table.title: This is the current list of detection backfill already setup within the backlog to be processed

search.query: | inputlookup detection_backfill_healthcheck_backlog | eval hc_created_time = strftime(hc_created_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z"), orig_exec_time = strftime(orig_exec_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z"), orig_search_et = strftime(orig_search_et,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z"), orig_search_lt = strftime(orig_search_lt,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z"), last_refresh = "$last_refresh$", action=case("list"=="remove","‚ùå Remove this instance",1==1,"-") | where match(app,"$filter_app$") AND match(savedsearch_name,"$filter_savedsearch$") | table hc_uid, batch_name, batch_priority, hc_created_time, hc_created_author, orig_exec_time, orig_search_et, orig_search_lt, orig_scan_count, orig_event_count, orig_result_count | rename batch_name as "Name", batch_priority as "Priority", hc_created_author as "Batch created by", hc_created_time as "Batch created on", hc_uid as UID, orig_scan_count as "Original scan count", orig_event_count as "Original event count", orig_result_count as "Original result count", orig_exec_time as "Original execution time", orig_search_et as "Original earliest time", orig_search_lt as "Original latest time"
